title: Signatures

content: Can i use a jpg as my signature in Thunderbird mobile?

title: Email signature on mobile
creator: harrison2604
content:
I have a custom image for my business email signature on Thunderbird desktop.

Im trying to get Thunderbird mobile to use the same image, or HTML signature when sending business emails from mobile. All i can find is a simple text input box for mobile signature. It doesn't accept html or images.

Help? Thx
metadata: ;useragent:Mozilla/5.0 (Linux; Android 10; K) AppleWebKit/537.36 (KHTML, like Gecko) SamsungBrowser/27.0 Chrome/125.0.0.0 Mobile Safari/537.36;os:Android
